content:
Svaka maamo-deesaayaal-paapam pokki
Vimalatha cher-tthoneesho-raajan dhanyan.
Jaathikalle! Modippin-mariyaam chonnaall
Mal puthrasnaanatthaal-ulakam minni.
Kaikottuka-kaikottuka-yorddaane! Nee
Ninnil snaa-nam cheyvaan-mashihaa vannu.
Yorddaane-paavanamaa-kkeedum suthane
Kandappoll-bhoothangall-pedichodi.
Kara keriya mashihaaye-kaikkondeedaan
Dhavallaambara-dhaarikallaay-vanneerenmaar.
Mashihaathan snaanatthe maanicheedaan
Shubhraamshuka-bhooshitharaay-vanneerenmaar.
Yoohaanon-manavaattiyo-devam chonnaan:
Thval priyana-llayyo nyaan bhrthyan maathram.
Maanippaan-vaanatthil-thaathan chonnaan
Ivanen priya-thanayan nyaan-ivanil preethan
Manmayanaa-lagnimayan snaanappettu.
Vaanidavum -paaridavum-kampam poondu.
Paavanamaam-snaanatthaal-kshemam poonda
Ambaravum -bhoothalavum -sthothram paadum
Jalajanmaa-re parishu-ddhaathmaavinte
Kunyaaduka-lle mauli u-yartthi paadin
